title: (4550) Sobrado - 91 Rua Emídio Navarro
description:
Very near small town center. A little unleveled. NOTE: it happens here each two week open market (6 and 21; when Sunday, anticipates to Saturday). Nice places to eat near.
Calm. Service spot - W corner aside white container - is wick to grey water discharge.

title: (4550) Castelo de Paiva - 25 Rua Jean Tyssen
title_short: (4550) Castelo de Paiva - 25 Rua Jean Tyssen
description: Washing machine and dryer

title: (4550) Santa Maria de Sardoura - EM222-1
description: Top of a hill with 360 degree views. Large parking space. Picnic tables. Magnificent view of the Douro Valley. A great spot to take pictures on the swing of love… Be careful, the road climbs very steeply to get up there.

title: (4550-364) Fornos - 520 EM502
description: Uncontrolled water. clear water. 2 fountains at the edge of the road.

title: (4550) Fornos - N222
description: Very quiet area on the banks of the Douro River. It has public toilets with shower (they are closed at night), river beach with rental of kayaks and paddle surf, cafeteria / restaurant and swimming pools

title: (4575) - 50 Rua Conde Vale da Rica
description: Superb parking on the quays along the Douro in a small village. Ideal for a break, possible to spend the night but not tested.

title: (4575) Vitetos de Cima - 245 Rua Conde Vale da Rica
title_short: (4575) Vitetos de Cima - 245 Rua Conde Vale da Rica
description: View of the Douro, now in July / August is the entertainment of many young people. Afterwards this is an excellent quiet Camper spot. Lots of fish for the fish fanatics. Please note that you do not have to follow the GPS but the signs beach / paria Bitetos via the road N108-1, this is the route. Not via village this is for locals with small cars, we drive ourselves and there are no turning spots. Do not ignore the road signs!

title: (4575) - 266 Rua Conde Vale da Rica
description: Along the way without issue on the banks, possibility to park for the night. stand far enough away from the restaurants. some cars come make a half turn and sometimes stop a moment. large space at the end for the half round, no worries with our camping because 7, 5 m.

title: (4550) São Martinho de Sardoura -
description: Good spot to spend the night. dead end street leading to the entrance to a derelict house. We had a quiet night. We can hear the traffic pick up on the N222 in the early morning but nothing disturbing.

title: (4550) Real -
description: Very nice picnic area (height: ~640m) with four tables and two covered grill stations. There is a water point and toilets, but they are not always open. The view is breathtaking and there is also a great swing. Next to the square there is a small chapel and a small stage.

title: (4550) Real - Unnamed Road
description: Clay trail leading to what appears to be a church. No one on the horizon, the spot is relatively clean compared to what we have already seen in Portugal, and above all the view is breathtaking. Thank you for leaving the right impeccable, even if it means picking up some papers that are not yours.

title: (4690) Souselo - 3138 N222
description: Nice complete area just aside EN 222 at Souselo village, with free services including toilets and showers; each plot has electricity(6A) and fresh water. 8 places for motor homes up to 8m; supermarket and restaurant at 100 m, gas station at 400 m. Picnic tables, playground for children and fitness equipment in the field. Besides place is just aside road, it is at lower level, so traffic noise does not perturb and it is reduced by night. Many thanks to the municipality of Cinfães for this very nice place, with extended view over Douro valley.

title: (4550) Santa Maria de Sardoura - Variante à N224
title_short: (4550) Santa Maria de Sardoura - Variante à N224
description: Nice little corner at the edge of the water and in the shade for a midday stop.

title: (4575) - 636 Rua da Vista Alegre
description: Private villa that offers free water to all motorhomes. Enter the small door of the property and use the hose to supply water. No payment required. The owner provides water from his property to all motorhomes. (door n ° 604)

title: (4540) - EM505
description: New area in Espiunca, at the beginning of the Paiva river walkways

title: (4575) - Rua São Tiago
description: The place is near a marina and located between two rivers, the beautiful Douro is the morning view on quite night. The are several places to stop the car, Sundays are quite busy.

title: (4540) Espiunca - 12 Rua 1 de Maio
description: Water point

title: (4540) Espiunca - EM505
description: Ground parking and boil, busy during the day and very quiet at night. Not very good entry. Ideal to access "the Paiva river footbridges"; spectacular infrastructure designed to take a walk of 8km enjoying a fantastic landscape. It is advisable to check out the entrance to the Tourism Office of Arouca beforehand

title: (4575-010) - 10 Avenida de Miratâmega
description: Spacious parking, no camper size limit next to the Municipal Market and Continent Supermarket

title: (4575-003) Várzea - 394 Rua da Cachorrela
description: Parking by Intermarché Alpendorada. Laundry, shop, and gas station.

title: (4575-052) Alpendurada e Matos - F Avenida Francisco Sá Carneiro
title_short: (4575-052) Alpendurada e Matos - F Avenida Francisco Sá Carneiro
description: Large fairgrounds (except fairgrounds - Saturdays)

title: (4575-612) Rio Mau - Rua Santo
description: Quiet corner on the banks of the Douro with barbecue, stone tables and benches, garbage cans. Small beach. Clean corner to respect.

title: (4575) - Caminho da Granja de Matos
description: Lazer Park of Alpendorada. Very good for a stopover, large car park, water point and toilets indicated on the map. Mini football pitch, basketball, fitness trail near the dam on the edge of the Tâmega. Possible night.

title: (4550) Pedorido - Unnamed Road
description: Large free camping area. river access: swim or SUP (used by a lot of locals). on a hiking trail. road to access is partially narrow.

title: (4575) Quebrada - 153 Rua de Barco do Souto
title_short: (4575) Quebrada - 153 Rua de Barco do Souto
description: Small parking lot with some picnic tables very quiet

title: (4575) Rio de Moinhos - 543 Rua Souto
description: Large parking lot, empty all day. At night a bit of passage because the young people meet here, but it remains calm. The view is very nice, and if you have any concerns there is a great mechanic nearby. Quite a few strays though, so my dogs spent quite a bit of time barking. There is a park 20min walk away, and the douro is 30min away. There is a hiking trail that starts from the town. Attention, no shade, spot exposed from 09:00 to evening. And quite difficult to access because narrow street and people park there. My cc is 2m15 wide, and 6.80 long: that was right.

title: (4550) Pedorido - N222
description: Go down to the picnic area, and continue down to the right along the water. Lit parking, almost level so as not to stall, hard ground and paved road. Possibility to turn around at the end. Very accessible and spacious for long vehicles. Restaurant nearby. Weak noise from the chime that rings every hour (didn't bother us), possible passage of pleasure boats. Possibility to swim in the stream on the beach on the left

title: (4550) Pedorido - Unnamed Road
description: Large parking area. road to access a bit narrow. no infrastructure. 200m to the river beach (cafe, toilet, playground). hiking trail.

title: (4550) Pedorido - N222
description: At the edge of the Souri, picnic site under development. Small car park of about 6 places. No service but nice for a picnic break.

title: (4550) Pedorido - 13 N222
description: Near a lake. Quiet place for the night, easy to access. Ideal for landing a few days before joining Paiva walkways (8km hike along the river)

title: (4550) Pedorido - N222
description: Behind the church, with table and shadows but the belt rings every hour at night.

title: (4550-501) Pedorido - 2273 Rua Principal da Póvoa
description: Water fountain next to a toilet block

title: (4625) - 1522 N108
description: Parking below the paved church. We settled in 3 motorhomes between 6 m to 7.50 m for picnics. Possibility to turn around. Water but toilet closed. We did not stay for the night.

title: (4625) Favões - Unnamed Road
description: River beach, very peaceful and cleaned. A lot of people camping over night. Ideal for relax, take sun and swimming. The access is steep not ideal for the biggest campervans.

title: (4625) Penha Longa - 3450 CM1276
description: Nice place on the banks of the Douro River.  Accessible up to 100 meters from the water's edge.  A small pier with the possibility of fishing and canoeing.  A small corner with a place for barbecue and a picnic table.  Also accessible to large motorhomes, a pleasant place for a stopover. Easy to get there and easy to leave.

title: (4575) Penafiel - 212 Avenida São Miguel
description: Intermarché Termas São Vicente (Penafiel - Porto)

title: (4690) - 88 N222
description: Tap for filling the water tank on a small picnic area

title: (4515) Lomba -
description: Place near the river, quiet and shaded. Accessible to several vehicles. No busy road. Close to towns with services.

title: (4540) Canelas - R326-1
description: Top parking of paiva bridges. Perfect for sleeping. Very quiet at night. They do not pose any problems while sleeping

title: (4540-117) Arouca - 9 Rua Alferes Diogo Malafaia
description: O Alphaite. Nice, clean laundry. For a few euros extra, you can leave your laundry behind and pick it up a few hours later.

title: (4540) Alvarenga -
description:
Dark, quiet and flat field/parking
parked there over night to visit the 516arouca bridge

title: (4540) Arouca - CM1251
description: Beautiful spot in the middle of nature! Best view of Arouca city and surroundings. Wc and bar only open in the summer time and a lot of picnic tables. Awesome 4g

title: (4515) Melres - 60 Rua da Praia
description: Nice corner with beach. Very quiet and quiet away. Flat ground and paved. The toilets do not work anymore. Had an excellent night.

name: Chapel Picnic Park
title: (4575) Chapel Picnic Park
description: Parque de merendas de capela. Picnic Park with lots of parking for overnighting. Small bar during peak summer season.

title: (4540) Vilarinho - R326-1
description: Not allowed for cars longer than 5 meters. Furthermore, a very nice place on the water

title: (4540-021) Albisqueiros - 1916 N225
description: Public toilets, parking over night not recommend. there are markets in the morning.

title: (4540) Arouca - Rua Sub-Ribes
description: Arouca, caravan park area, picnic area at the entrance of the city. Market day is 2 days every month. The rubbish is knee deep, left after the market. rendering the site filthy resembling the local dump.

title: (4515) Melres - 315 Rua de Midões
description: Located on the small beach on the Duo River. There is even a small swimming area supervised by lifeguards. After the restaurant, go straight to the end and turn left into the gravel road. On the left side can be parked, on the right is the restricted stop. During the day boats and bathers. With motorhome 6.80 m no problem. The weekend is busy.. Families come in the morning from 9 a.m. Calm during the week.

title: (4515) Melres - Rua da Portagem
description: Supervised beach, parking nearby with various snacks

title: (4515-552) Melres - 80 Rua Padre Jerónimo
description: Parking in a green area next to the Duero river and with a river beach, bars, restaurants, supermarket and showers on the beach. Very quiet place to spend the night and very good access for motorhomes even with a trailer.

title: (4515-542) Montezelo - 357 Rua do Montezelo
description: Parking at the leisure center, small grocery store open very late. Many places available, sloping access, beware of the hitch that rubbed when leaving. Calm at night but beware of the rooster in the early morning. No possibility of emptying. Convenient for a night in troubleshooting given the few areas in this region.

title: (4515) Pé de Moura - 267 Largo da República
title_short: (4515) Pé de Moura - 267 Largo da República
description: Very quiet, on the banks of the Douro River (World Heritage of Humanity), without services. Possibility of water nearby. WiFi coffee Tretas. WC and playground. Leveled, no shadows. Small vehicles only.

title: (4515) Lomba - Rua da Bouça
description: Very nice place on Praia da Lomba, right at the end of the peninsula. The parking lot is directly at the lido, which is why there are many parking spaces. ATTENTION: The way there could be too narrow / steep for some vehicles. However, the view is worth the effort.

title: (4575-580) Valpedre -
description:
Recently built, beautiful and calm place with all facilities for motorhomes.
Washing basins, bathrooms and showers available. Secure Wi-Fi service. Not possible to use hotel amenities.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Parking that is taking a small road at the dam. There is a steep slope to go. A small concrete parking and another further down made of sand. We were on the second with our heavy weight. Opportunity to dive your feet in the Douro following the path at the end of the second parking. Do not be afraid of the way, it's pretty rocky. 5 minutes walk

title: (4515) Lomba - 41 N222
description: WATER POINT-tap with water next to the park of Merendas, at the viewpoint.

title: (4690) - Rua de Torneiros
description: Flat concrete parking with a view of the Carrapatelo dam. The parking lot is now closed. Great views over the river. Water can be found when you leave the main road 500 meters from the car park.

title: (4560) -
description: Great paved spot by the water with shadows and picnic areas. A bar open until midnight can cause a bit of noise at night, but it's also a great place to have a beer.

name: Campidouro
title: (4515) Campidouro
description: Very pleasant and quiet campsite for this period (September) with a breathtaking view of the Douro. Very large swimming pool with a snack bar. Space for children. No shops nearby. 25kms from Porto. Well shaded place. Clean sanitary facilities.

title: (4560) - Rua do Salgueiral
description: Small earthen car park just above the spot on the edge of the Drouo. No service but allows you to spend a quiet night away from the bar which al ere to sing all evening on this Saturday. Place flat and quite far from the road. So pretty cool

title: (4540) Alvarenga - Unnamed Road
description: Cross of Paradihna

title: (4690) Cinfães - CM1022
description: Above the dam that you can cross, on a connecting road over the Duro to the north! Quiet at night, around 6 o'clock the rush hour starts! Then it gets louder! Flat place!

name: Parque de Campismo de Mourilhe
title: (4690) Parque de Campismo de Mourilhe
description:
Mourilhe motorhome parking, camping and glamping, providing everything for a 5 star stay next to Douro River.
Prices start at 20 euros per night for a motorvan with 2 people and eletricity. 

Full price list at website

Motorhome Park | Bungalows | Restaurant | SPA | Gym | Swimming pool | Convenience store

title: (4690) - CM1022
description: Picnic area at the edge of a small waterfall, tables, toilets, water point, bardecue. Beware, this place is on the road but not very busy. The TOP for a lunch, swimming, walking along the brook ...

title: (4690) Cinfães -
description:
If you are visiting Northern Portugal, we also invite you to our paradise. Our land is 1.3 hectare big where you can park during the day and night although it is accesible mostly only with motorbikes, cars and vans because there is a 265cm wide bridge before our place which has a little bend too. But if you come without a motorhome, you can sleep here also in a tent under the starry sky. 

If you travel with your pet, he/she is welcome here too, just let us know before you come, because we also have two dogs. 

As for the toilet, we have only one compost toilet, what you can use as well. In addition, we provide water but the drinking water is limited because we bring it from a fresh spring nearby. At the moment, for electricity, we have only a solar system, which is also limited, we can charge just the usual devices with, like phones, laptop, etc.
Anyway, if you have some extra request, let us know, because we have hammocks, slack line, picnic table and cooking stuffs, like camping gas etc, what we can also offer.

If you got interested, come and swim under the waterfalls, relax and clear your mind in the nature, enjoy the sunset from a panoramic view and let's explore Cinfães and the beautiful Douro valley with its amazing features. 
The surroundings also offers many activities such as boating on the Douro river, hiking or biking in the embrace of majestic mountains, looking round the marvellous wine region, walking around the cobbled streets of the fabulous small cities and villages and much more programs.

The price applies to one vehicle and one person per night.

title: (4560) - N319
description: Free day and night parking with restrooms near historic village of Quintandona

title: (4540) - 1889 N326
description: Picnic area and views of the mountains. Possibility to go online for motorhomes, 2 places. Only for the day and a short break, the land seems to be of the church.

title: (4630) Paredes de Viadores - M584
description: Very well organized picnic area! Large car park with two entrances, without stripes. So also long campers ok. It is close to the road, so I don't know if there is any noise from cars in the evening. Excellent for a daytime stopover, with tables and grill available. Field to play. Public toilets from the main entrance. Super quiet. Maybe over the weekend it will be busier.

title: (4540) Moldes - CM326
description: Picnic park, balcony and an incredible view. Nice place and little moved, but at least not on the day I estive it.

title: (4690) Cinfães - 23 Rua São Sebastião
description: 20 car parking spaces near a municipal football stadium. flat car park.

title: (4690) Cinfães - CM1023
description: Nice picnic area in the forest of Parque do Lodario with several small picnic areas with tables and chairs. Sufficient shade. Fresh water available and rubbish bins at every place. About 100 meters downhill there are more table sets at several pools and a view of the valley. Approach on paved road but steep. Parking at the roadside.

title: (4540) Burgo -
description: In the middle of green at the end of the path there is a parking space for max. 2 campers. Relatively flat surface, accessibility okay. There is a drinking water tap at the beginning of the path and a barbecue area on the site itself.

title: (4540) - Rua da Igreja
description: Small place near the Paiva River

title: () Paços de Gaiolo - N108
description: Great view of the Douro. On the N-108 road.

title: (4690) - Unnamed Road
description: Superb spot on top of a mountain with 360 degree views of the surrounding valleys. The milieu of a wind farm wind but so tranquility assured at night and in the morning! Wind turbine noise is not annoying at all. Access is by paved road. No toilet but water points, picnic table and garbage.

title: (4690) Cinfães - 1 Rua Santa Bárbara
description: Large parking at the entrance of the city. All shops nearby

title: (4585) Sobreira - 58 Rua das Pinguelas
description: Nice spot next to the river. It seems like an abandoned bar / picnic area. Stayed the night without any problems. Very calm

title: (4690) Tendais - Unnamed Road
description: Small picnic area by the side of the road with spectacular views. Space for one or two vans.

title: (4515-345) Medas - 472 Avenida Central de Broalhos
description: Self-service laundromat 24/24

title: (4630) - 2633 N210
description: Quiet place in the aisles. Park and stay next to the houses next to the church at the door. But if it is closed there is another one opposite which is wide and open.

title: (4560) Paço de Sousa - 24 Rua Egas Moniz
title_short: (4560) Paço de Sousa - 24 Rua Egas Moniz
description: Small parking in front of the GNR, with a small park in front

title: (4540) Meitriz - Beco da Costeira
description: Nice and calm spot just by the river and surrounded by nature.

title: (3600) Cabril - 9 CM1129

title: (4540) Albergaria da Serra -
description: Beautiful place not far from the main road, but the access is only 4x4. Maybe if you have a SUV with a good ground clearance it’s ok. Nice view to the mountains.

title: (4640) Baião - N211
description: A small dirt parking lot can be level ready along the river Douro. A spring water source of the mountain. No development. Apparently very calm.

title: (4515) Covelo - 833-865 Rua Combatente Rolando Santos Pinto
title_short: (4515) Covelo - 833-865 Rua Combatente Rolando Santos Pinto

description: Lots of locations. near a chapel below a road with very little passage. water point . exceptional view of the valley. we did not spend the night there because at altitude.

description: Small place at the bottom of a small path (Max 2m wide) some waste on the ground ... not far from the senhora do salto climbing site

Small campsite with basic services, located at 900m altitude. 
Good starting point for hikers.

title_short: (4585) Paredes - Rua da Portela da Senhora

title: (4540) Albergaria da Serra - M511
description: Parking to do the PR15 route of the Parideiras stones. Ample parking spaces and 2 explicitly for large vehicles such as motorhomes or buses. There is a picnic area right next door.

title: (4585) - N319-2
description: Nice parking to stay, at 5 minute walk from the river and the climbing place, quiet night, close to one 'bar', really cheap. A good place to chill and have a rest.

title: (4515-027) Covelo - 89 Rua Combatente Rolando Santos Pinto
title_short: (4515-027) Covelo - 89 Rua Combatente Rolando Santos Pinto

title: (4515) Covelo - Praceta Gastão Fernandes Guedes
description: Parking possible at the marina, attention to cantilever    slope, we arrived at night, certainly little room in the day, noisy cafe with lots of cars on weekends

title: (4515-027) Covelo - 719 N108
description: In front of the Douro river. Beautiful view. Parking only. No services Bar and Marina next door. Safe place.

title: (4515) Covelo - 9 Praceta Santa Isabel

title: (4540) - Unnamed Road
description: Enchanting place to spend time relaxing. LEAVE CLEAN!

title: (4630) Freixo -
description: Louredo’s Farm                                      Organic Farm with parking lot, laundry, hot shower, electricity, point of view, animals, beautiful surroundings, organic food, etc.  We have six very friendly dogs, and they will love you!                                  PS: The entrance can be difficult for very large caravan.

title: (4560) Penafiel - 43 Rua Dom Inácio e São Caetano
title_short: (4560) Penafiel - 43 Rua Dom Inácio e São Caetano

title: (4560) Penafiel - Variante Cavalum
description: Free parking next to a beautiful park. Very quiet and beautiful area right next to the Magikland amusement park. Toilets opened from 9:00 till 19:00, 250 m from the parking (behind the bar in the park)

title: (4540) - EM621
description: Parking place with picnic area, near the waterfalls of Frecha da Mizarela with nice view of the mountains. Quiet during the night.

title: (4540) Cabreiros -
description: Large flat surface to land in the middle of the ruins of the mine. Absolute tranquility, very few walkers during the day, and no one at night. To access the nearest waterfall, the trails are not easy to find, you have to go to the village above. Superb little hike where you pass through the galleries of the mine to access a heavenly place, be careful with young children, the path is steep. Access to the sector for large vehicles is quite tense, if not impossible, the roads are very narrow and dangerous.

title: (4690) Oliveira do Douro - N222
description: Picnic area with grill at the viewpoint

title: (4560) Guilhufe - Rua de Subpena
description: Free service area, overnight possible but too close to the road, possible spaces just below but not tested.

title: (4560-221) Marecos - n.º1279 Rua de Santo André
title_short: (4560-221) Marecos - n.º1279 Rua de Santo André
description: Magikland parking is a very wide esplanade of land to be able to leave the AC while you visit the amusement park with the children

title: (4415) Crestuma - Rua Fontinha
description: Free parking with a good view to the dam.

title: (4640) Mesquinhata -
description:
Paved road leading to a motorable track, more for Vans and vans, with small spaces on the side to spend a cool and quiet night, almost at the top of the hill, in the middle of the pampas...
distant view of the Douro Valley.

title: () - EM612
description: A completely isolated spot on a slightly rough and muddy 4x4 trail, sheltered by rocky hills. We hiked to the top of eastern hill in the morning to watch the sun rise over the valley and the views were lovely!

title: (4560) Penafiel - 9293 Rua Victorino da Costa
description: Big parking located in the town center

title: (4505) Vale Da Cabra - 1334 Rua Principal
description: Free source drinking water

title: (4515) Foz do Sousa - 3715 Avenida Francisco Sá Carneiro
title_short: (4515) Foz do Sousa - 3715 Avenida Francisco Sá Carneiro
description:
Shady parking spot near the Douro River.

There's a bar upstairs and some granit tables. Relatively flat area. Calm except for the road and some fishermen.

title: (4640) Ancede - 173 Rua do Cruzeiro
description: I discovered this watering hole along the rota de romanico. The water tastes good and you can probably even wash clothes and/or dishes here. There is a large parking lot opposite.

title: (4560) Penafiel - 233 Travessa Atafona
description: On the edge of a new road not yet frequented enough, very nice view, quiet, ideal for one night

title: (4560-496) Penafiel - 285 Rua Província de Pontevedra
description: Quite a large parking lot in front of a sports field with about 25 spaces, also suitable for larger campers. Ideal for families with a skate park and playground. Directly opposite, very cheap and family-friendly pizzeria with its own play tower for children and air conditioning! We stood very quietly 1 night.

title: (4415-616) Crestuma - 16 Rua Fontinha
description: A beautiful place to be at night.  A place with a lot of movement for the summer, in the spring a little movement and in the winter very quiet.  In winter a small cafe is open and the Marquês das Francesinhas only opens a few hours during the day.  Very quiet place in winter.

title: (4515-162) Foz do Sousa - 102 Rua da Escola Velha
title_short: (4515-162) Foz do Sousa - 102 Rua da Escola Velha
description: Good local. Very good!

title: (4580) Paredes - 14 Avenida João Paulo II
description: Large car park near the center of Paredes with many shops, quiet on weekends. Free without service..

title: (4505) Salgueiral - 760 Rua Principal
description: Drinking water from the source with wash-house

title: (4560) Penafiel - 239 Avenida Zeferino de Oliveira
description: Sameiro Church car park.

title: (4415) Crestuma - 81 Estrada Penedo
description: Parking bay directly on the Douro river. It is not an official car park but as the road ends at a cafe/restaurant/kayak rental there is no traffic other than guests. Space for 2-3 cars. We had a quiet night and woke up to a beautiful river view. ☀️

title: (4580-127) Paredes - 23 Rua Dona Rosalina Guimarães
description: Large parking area in the village, a little inclined.

title: (3700-739) Mâmoa - 166 Rua Campo de Tiro
description: Flat parking of an artificial beach area, quiet at night. small walks nearby and fountain very convenient to recharge water for free. I spent a quiet night there. 4 places for online motorhomes and 15 places for fitted vans.

title: (3700) - 211 Rua Casa da Mâmoa
description: Large car park. We were able to park in the back of the parking lot, further from the road. We saw no bans for the night. Relatively flat parking lot, flatter and larger than the one a little lower down.

title: (3730) - EM612
description: Place, near a small chapel, where its charm is due to its wild character and its beautiful view!

title: (4560) Penafiel - 413 Rua Vista Alegre
description: Laundry Self Service

title: (4515) Foz do Sousa - 750 Rua das Águas
title_short: (4515) Foz do Sousa - 750 Rua das Águas
description: Small picnic area at the edge of De Sousa River. We heard no one during the night and no one came before 10am. Only 15-20 minutes from the center of Porto it is very convenient. Possibility to swim in the river. Attention arrive well by the Ruas das Aguas because the gps can make come by a dirt road at the exit of the A43.

title: (4505) Caldas de São Jorge - 73 Rua Dona Graciete Santos
title_short: (4505) Caldas de São Jorge - 73 Rua Dona Graciete Santos
description: These are thermal baths accessible to all with very pleasant water.

title: (4505) Fiães - 4505 Rua Rio Uima
description: Quiet place to sleep and to spend a day in nature, walking or biking in the natural park (passadiços de Fiães, Parque das Ribeiras). Picnic area not far away

title: (4560) Penafiel - Rua Zona Indústrial II
description: Intermarché with gas station, air, water and laundry.

title: (3730) Junqueira -
description: Nice shaded area (I didn’t take a picture of it but it’s there, really tall trees - the picture is the view from the trees) next to the road so pretty safe with many picnic tables and a nice view over the valley

title: (4505) VÁRZEA - 192 Rua Várzea
description: Green space with am shadows and picnic tables, having public grills has a snack bar, has a small stream but it is not allowed to swim too much, very quiet to spend the day just picnic with grills, with coffee and bath rooms, ideal for a stroll pedestrian, has a small stream but can take baths.

title: (4505, Port) - 150 Avenida Parque Desportivo
description: Quiet car park with a nice view of the city, above a school (a few cars around 9 a.m.) and craft area. forest nearby, for walks.

title: () - Rua Carvalha
description: Picknick area with several places for overnight stay 24h.

title: (4515-649) Foz do Sousa - 120 Rua Beira Rio
title_short: (4515-649) Foz do Sousa - 120 Rua Beira Rio
description: The descent is very difficult!!!!! vehicles more than 5 mt. mission Impossible. the output is even worse!!!!! experienced drivers only!!!!

title: (4585) Gandra - 513 Rua dos Casais
description:
Gigantic parking lot. And calm!

Suitable for overnight, if not just a football match is raging.

title: (4580) Bitarães - 342 Rua D`Além
description: A parking lot at the edge of the road which is nothing exceptional but which has the merit of being flat and with a lot of parking spaces (parking lot in 2 parts). We spent one night there and apart from the fact that there are quite a few passing cars, we weren't bothered.

name: Greenval | Rural Camping
title: (3730-180) Greenval | Rural Camping
description:
About us ➡️ A project by a couple, Isabel and João, who decided in 2016 to achieve their life goals: living in peace and tranquility in nature, having moved from Porto to a rural village at an altitude of 860m, located in Serra da Freita! They bought 15 000m2 of wilderness, where they’ve been working on a sustainable rural project, in collaboration with the local community. 

What we do ➡️ We grow several fruits and greens, and raise chickens for their eggs. We also produce artisanal pizzas, biscuits, jams and liqueurs. 

We provide Yoga & Ecotherapy programs, contemplative hikes and rural experiences with the local inhabitants. 

Parking conditions ➡️ There are 6 spots next to the main house, with a view over the valley, and even the sea in the distance. 

Experiences ➡️ We provide several pre-booked activities (prices and conditions vary). 

?Yoga & Ecotherapy
?Massages and sound & vibrations with Tibetan singing bowls
?Claytherapy
?Contemplative hikes
?Hiking with the donkey
?Conversations with the villagers

Worth checking out in the vicinity
?Ponte 516 Arouca - Suspended footbridge 
?Paiva Walkways
?Centro Interpretativo das Pedras Parideiras 
?Freita Weather Radar
?Rota da Água e da Pedra - Outeiro dos Riscos
?Paraduça Bread House
?Pontemieiro artisanal cheese maker
?Lunch and dinner in the restaurant "Mira Freita" (regional restaurant right here in Felgueira) 

Welcome!

title: (4540) Cabreiros -
description: Place in the middle of nature near ruins and wind turbines. Accessible only by 4x4 from the track departing from Cabreiros.

title: (4415-694) Olival - 80 Largo São Mateus
description:
Right next to Café Sá, in the pretty village of Arnelas, public toilets and showers, at least open during the day. Possible hot water in the showers (not tested).

Garbage cans and parking nearby.

title: (4440) Valongo - Rua de Couce
description: Parking at the entrance of the "Serras do Porto" path. Be careful to access it by crossing the village not to have a large motorhome. An L2H2 master passes. The parking lot is small...4 places maximum. And it is a parking lot for hiking departures, going to the climbing site, etc.

title: (3730-261) Vale de Cambra - 417 Avenida Infante Dom Henrique
title_short: (3730-261) Vale de Cambra - 417 Avenida Infante Dom Henrique
description: It is new and with all services. It is located in the city center, next to the city park. quiet at night. The 5 pitches are 8 meters long and easily accessible. There is also a moderate amount of traffic during the day and walkers pass by regularly.

title: (3700-414) Arrifana - Rua Aliança Futebol Club
description:
Laundry facilities outside the Intermarche and another one inside.
4 EUR washing, 2 EUR dryer 20min.
"Cheap" fuel, in relation.

title: (4440) Valongo - Corredor Ecológico
description: Dusty spot by a river in the middle of the nature, shady and  nearby a small settlement. Not suitable for large vehicles (max length 7m max width 2m). Steep and narrow access with bad route.

title: (4535-014) Lourosa -
description: Excellent self service laundry. To wash and dry. Clean and friendly.

title: (3660-044) Candal -
description: Just a small parking lot for those who suffered from the climbs. We spent a quiet night there. no car. a little sight. passage of electric cable not terrible but it helps out.

title: (4690) - Er 321
description: Portas do Montemuro, great place with a 360 degree view of the valleys. next door is a gas station. little traffic in the evening. the dog yells at the gas station at night. compensated the morning after

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Great place for a night of absolute calm, this has been a real pleasure for us. There are toilets but closed that day, a water tap, is she drinking? Plenty of room. A stone stairway leads to a remarkable views of the Douro Valley. The site is perfectly accessible to the motorhome by narrow roads but passes it hassle-free.

title: (4660) Miomães - 1862 N222
description: Parking in the marina, in front of the office of tourism, near the hot spring and baths. Games for children. Great view of the Douro, quieter than near the bar. Empty parking lot off season (March).

title: (4660) Miomães - 140 Rua de Vila Nazaré
description: Clean drinkable water

title: (4660) Miomães - 68 Avenida Doutor Correia Pinto
description: Parking on the banks of the Douro, opposite the thermal baths, near the marina, very easy access, we did not stay at night but it should not pose any difficulty

title: (4440) Valongo - Corredor Ecológico
description: Place in nature and easy access. A large flat land ideal for motorhome. Some rubbish but beautiful quiet place with some trails in the middle of the forest. Path wide enough paved. No services.

title: (3660) Bairro Ponte de Manhouce - 5 Bairro Ponte de Manhouce
title_short: (3660) Bairro Ponte de Manhouce - 5 Bairro Ponte de Manhouce
description: Parking at local park, big enough for vans. We were only here during the day, but there was no apparent overnight ban.

title: (4510-036) Jovim - Av. Beira Rio
description: Place to park 1 or 2 trucks or motorhomes (but not too big). We preferred this place to the other side as peaceful at night and not frequented by young people at night. Just 1 fisherman or 2. We spent a quiet night without noise, apart from the usual barking of Portuguese dogs from time to time (you will have to explain to me why in this country we hear dogs barking every night everywhere where we go !!)

title: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - 175 Rua Luis de Camões
title_short: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - 175 Rua Luis de Camões
description:
Laundromat
hours 7 a.m. / 11 p.m.

title: (4635) Toutosa - 28 Rua Toutosa
description: Nice place in the center of a calm village, shop on the square and a public toilet available.

title: (4560) Penafiel - 260 Rua Bento Peixoto
description: Drinking water point, easy to fill water bottle

title: (4560-055) Castelões - A4
description: Gas station parking. There is a well reserved place where you can spend the night

name: Retiro da Fraguinha
title: (3660) Retiro da Fraguinha
description: Camping in beautiful mountain surroundings. We did not stay there because we were just passing through, but would be a reason to come back if necessary. ;-) Attention relatively cool, there in the middle of the mountains.

title: (4430-769) Avintes - 60 Rua Azenha
description:
A park next to the beach, you can spend a few hours. 
It has a bar near the beach if you need toilets or drinks.

title: (3700-315) São João da Madeira - 841 Avenida Engenheiro Arantes e Oliveira
title_short: (3700-315) São João da Madeira - 841 Avenida Engenheiro Arantes e Oliveira
description: Public parking lot without access control and security guard, but is illuminated during the night and very quiet. On the main street near to the place there are some services like bakery, cafeteria, ATM and the Municipal Market.

title: (4440) Campo - 902 Rua de São João
description: Large parking lot with toilets. Came here because of the great climbing offer in the immediate vicinity.

title: (4510-001) Jovim - 1779 Rua da Aldeia
description: A quiet stop on the Douro.  A small passage on this little road as there is direct access to a small beach. Small snack, ice cream. No service. Forbidden to stay overnight.

title: (3660-097) São Pedro do Sul - CM1123
description: Small vantage point. Very nice view over the valley in which there is a small village. However, you can hear the wind turbines.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description:
Spacious flat place, good for visiting the magical village of Drave, walk 3.5 km until you get there. Easy route to the village and quite difficult on the return, since it is always uphill. There are about 300m of unpaved road to the place of overnight stay, it is not advisable to pass this place with the motorhome dirt road with parts with many deep holes.
Good trails.

title: (4510-113) Jovim - 548 Rua dos Praia
description: A place where you can park and walk until the little beach near the acess and enjoy  a quiet day.

title: (4640-187) Baião - 127 Rua Camões
description: Piece of land right next to galp gas station (with laundry machines). it's right next to the road but on a much lower level. fine to spend a night.

title: (3730) Vale de Cambra - 143 EM548
description: River beach parking lot. There is no service. The bar is open in summer, very calm river beach

title: (3660-043) Candal -
description: In the heart of nature at the end of a fairly long path, passable by 4x4 or motorhome. The place is peaceful, you feel like you are alone in the world. In the distance, a few wind turbines on a bed of heather and broom. We spent the night there without any problem For nature lovers! Please leave the place clean :)

title: (3660) - Unnamed Road
description: A place with a great view in the moutains.

title: (4440) Valongo - Rua António Augusto Castro Paupério
title_short: (4440) Valongo - Rua António Augusto Castro Paupério
description: Park with all services and parking, no supermarket Intermarché.

title: (4430) Avintes - 37 Rua Marco do Cardal
description: On the back of Lidl, we spent one night . You can use the free wifi from the supermarket. there are many good spots around Lidl.

title: (3660) Gamoal -
description: It feels like being in the land of Lord of the Rings. A very nice spot, a little windy but with a magnificent view. We witnessed a magnificent sunset. No one around.

title: (4430-812) Avintes - 176 Rua Cunha
description: RV park in Gaia Biological Park. 9 separate pitches in a very beautiful green, peaceful and quiet environment. electricity and sewerage. Ideal for visiting Porto. Direct buses to the center of Porto. One of the most beautiful parks. This price includes the visit to the biological park (animals, eagles, storks, deer, bison,...). Only for motorhomes with toilet/shower on board. Arrivals are only possible during the opening hours of the Park Biologico. 9am-7pm

title: (4520-209) Santa Maria da Feira - 28 Rua Doutor Vaz Ferreira
title_short: (4520-209) Santa Maria da Feira - 28 Rua Doutor Vaz Ferreira
description:
Quiet Location in a dead end road with a view to the at night illuminated church. No traffic in this street. Parking lane along the road. Spent a relaxed and undisturbed night. In the morning birds singing and rooster crows.

Ideal if you want to stay near but Not directly in Porto.

title: (4620) Rio Tinto - 342 N207-2
description: Simple parking 250 m from Caide train station to take the train to Pinhao. Departure 8:50 arrival 11:37. Return departure 16h23 arrival 18h25. The train runs along the Douro on 85% of the way, beautiful! And in the opposite direction Porto is 40 minutes.

title: (4520-200) Santa Maria da Feira - 54 Rua das Fogaceiras
title_short: (4520-200) Santa Maria da Feira - 54 Rua das Fogaceiras
description: Great place to stay overnight, really very quiet, the reviews about the other places in the city the common note was the noise and lack of peace, so I found this little paradise! it is in the shade of the trees by the little river. On a Saturday night I was the only one parked there. I believe it’s a good place for the weekends!

title: (4640) Campelo - 18 Rua do Montinhal
description:
New and free motorhomearea.
The service area is new. There are no signs indicating where it is. It is behind the municipal swimming pools and the sports hall.  Three places.

title: (4635) Várzea da Ovelha e Aliviada - Unnamed Road
title_short: (4635) Várzea da Ovelha e Aliviada - Unnamed Road
description:
Tranquility,  and magnificent landscape, this is our house at the gates of the beautiful and historic city of Amarante.
We would like it to be a great starting point for getting to know our beautiful region. Here are some suggestions for planning your trip.
We are located 10 minutes from the main node of national motorways that can take you to Porto, Guimarães, Braga, Vila Real, Lamego, Bragança, Chaves and many other cities of great historical and tourist interest. You may use direct public transport for some of them.
Amarante is our city. Small, with a rich historical center, crossed by the river Tâmega, cradle of the conventual sweets and center of a unique wine region, the Vinho Verde region.
And because we talk about wine, of course you can not miss the region of the Douro Valley, a landscape treasure that is the origin of the Port.
If you are nature lovers I have two suggestions of national parks: Gerês and Alvão. And, of course, the mountainous set that will be here in front, in the landscape of the terrace: the Marão.
But we will have an opportunity to talk about all this.
See you later!

title: (4535) Mozelos - 114 Rua Santa Luzia
description: Perfect for spending a night.

title: (4520-161) Santa Maria da Feira - 34 Avenida 25 de Abril
title_short: (4520-161) Santa Maria da Feira - 34 Avenida 25 de Abril
description: Parking 1 km from the Christmas village of Perlim (Portugal). Very spacious, you can spend the night, there are no services. There is a petrol station next to the parking lot. Ideal to go to see the town and sleep. Too quiet. Parking is hard ground.

title: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - 35 Avenida Doutor Belchior Cardoso da Costa
title_short: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - 35 Avenida Doutor Belchior Cardoso da Costa
description: Site for parking and overnight. Near the Castle.

address.street: 35 Avenida Doutor Belchior Cardoso da Costa

title: (4640) Campelo - R. Abel Ribeiro
description: Very nice place for a picnic. Most pitches are sloping but there is shade. The showers and toilets were very clean. bring paper!

title: (4605) Real - 618 Rua Doutor Joaquim da Silva Cunha
title_short: (4605) Real - 618 Rua Doutor Joaquim da Silva Cunha
description: Nice little parking lot in paved ground Very quiet I only stayed for lunch but I'm sure we can stay the night No service hard this parking lot

address.street: 618 Rua Doutor Joaquim da Silva Cunha

title: (4580) Lordelo - 100 Avenida Joaquim Mota
description: Quiet place with an excellent green park

title: (4580) Lordelo - 100 Avenida Joaquim Mota
description: Green areas and filling and emptying service.

title: () Santa Maria da Feira -
description: Parking quiet bathrooms nearby

title: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - 21 Largo Camões
title_short: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - 21 Largo Camões
description: Free and shaded parking, right next to public wc, various cafes and a fountain (i don't know if the water is drinkable). Various monuments to visit from there (castle, church, the path of trees, etc.). The tourist office is a 3 minute walk away. There is also a children's play area just above the parking lot, with a mini-golf course. During the day for sure, but be careful at night, there are walkers.

title: (4510) Valongo - 407 Rua Tenente Sá Nogueira
description: Right by the old abandoned sanatorium. Great view. ATTENTION - Access is only possible via the main road (N209) R.Cesario Verde! The access road is in good condition. You can park directly in front of the entrance or a little further up. Since it is a lost place, there is unfortunately a lot of rubbish lying around. However, you have a beautiful view.

title: (4430-867) Avintes - 86 Rua Paço
description: It's next to the road. It's not on the ground next door because we could not get in because of the puddles. Next to Del Río, an avenue. Very calm. A little noise if cars pass quickly.

title: (4415-135) Pedroso - 6 Rua Nova da Raposa
description: LPG petrol station. We had our French propane bottle refilled with LPG without worries, the person who served us had an adapter.

title: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - Alameda Roberto Vaz de Oliveira
title_short: (4520) Santa Maria da Feira - Alameda Roberto Vaz de Oliveira
description: Very beautiful medieval castle to visit, 3 euros adults and 1 euro big child. Possibility to fill the water maybe not for drinking but for cooking, shower, dishes. Sorting bin. Large park on the way down to the city center with an interesting museum with a great view. Many possibilities for sleeping, 2 parking lots or dirt road behind.

name: Casa Estêvão
title: (3660-328) Casa Estêvão
description:
This is a remote village that welcomes life. 
• Observe and feed the farm animals(sheep, goats, pig, rabbits, chickens, fishes)
• Picking a variety of fruits directly from the trees 
• Tasty products from the farm

title: (3730) Junqueira - 223 Rua São Miguel
description: Place with 4 picnic tables and with access to public showers

title: (4520-161) Santa Maria da Feira - 91 Rua Comendador Sá Couto
title_short: (4520-161) Santa Maria da Feira - 91 Rua Comendador Sá Couto
description: Fountain with drinking water, right next to the "CONTINENTE" shopping center and other shops. There are therefore several parking spaces, electricity in the shopping center, toilets and wifi.

title: (4520-176) Santa Maria da Feira - 8 Rua Penas
title_short: (4520-176) Santa Maria da Feira - 8 Rua Penas
description: Quiet parking near the center. Behind the Continente supermarket that has washing and drying machines. There is a fountain nearby. It does not have a parking meter and you can walk to visit the city. We spent two quiet nights.
